meanings.definition: Capital expenditure: money spent by a business or organization on acquiring or maintaining fixed assets
meanings.sent1: The company's capex went towards purchasing new machinery for the factory.
meanings.sent2: Our capex this year will be focused on upgrading our office infrastructure.
meanings.sent3: The capex decided to splurge on a fancy new coffee machine for the break room.
meanings.sent4: Investing in education is a capex for personal growth.
meanings.sent5: The capex for the building renovation was carefully planned and executed.

meanings.sent1: We need to review the capex for the upcoming fiscal year.
meanings.sent2: The board approved the capex budget for the new project.
meanings.sent3: The capex acronym always reminds me of the importance of financial planning.
meanings.sent4: In business, understanding capex is crucial for long-term success.
meanings.sent5: Learning about capex helped me make better financial decisions.
